author: anmenaga
body:
Some tests are failing release testing due to comparing strings with different line endings ("/r" vs "/r/n").
The tests should be updated to account for this.
[unelevated-toinvestigate.txt](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/files/3752899/unelevated-toinvestigate.txt)


# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
run release automation tests on Server 2016
```

# Expected behavior

pass

# Actual behavior

fail

# Environment data

Server 2016
